short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With Falkon Extension you can communicate with your customers via text without leaving your crm or any other browser tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FalkonSMS Chrome Extension

Falkon SMS Chrome Extension can be used to communicate with your customers via text without leaving your browser tab.

You can use FalkonSMS extension as a business texting tool to communicate with your customer phone numbers in your CRM or any other web apps.

Falkon SMS is a one-stop solution for all of your business texting!
Falkon SMS defines a truly enhanced business texting experience at its best
Assign multiple users to any conversation for being prompt in the support and responses to your customers
Broadcast your texts to all the contacts in your groups at once with the ease of a single click without any hassle
Whether it's a group text or an individual message, using custom fields, you can leave a lasting impact on your clients
Schedule one-time or recurring text messages for follow-ups, reminders, appointment updates
Create and use pre-defined templates to accelerate your messaging time and resolve queries at scale
Send all kinds of rich media such as images, GIFs, videos, audio files and more with MMS support
Download any important conversations to keep in your records or export them for future references
Add new  contacts and send them message directly
All falkon messages from chrome extension are synched across web, teams, desktop and android apps
 
NOTE:  You must have a FalkonSMS account to use this Chrome Extension. To create an account, please visit www.falkonsms.com. If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us at fs-support@falkonsystems.com.
